pageProduct.name: Thompson's Vitamin A 10000iu 150 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thompson's Vitamin A 10000iu helps support healthy immunity and eye function.

Thompson's Vitamin A 10000iu helps support healthy immunity, eye function and night vision. It also assist with maintaining healthy skin integrity

Size: 150caps

Oil-Free?: Yes

Shelf Life in Days: 1095

KEY FEATURES

• Helps support healthy immunity.
• Helps to support healthy eye function and night vision.
• Assists with maintaining healthy skin integrity.

Warnings

If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional. When taken in excess of 3000mcg retinol equivalents, Vitamin A can cause birth defects. If you are pregnant, or considering becoming pregnant, do not take vitamin A supplements without consulting your doctor or pharmacist. The recommended daily amount of Vitamin A from all aources is 700mcg retinol equivalents for women and 900mcg retinol equivalents for men. Contains: Soya oil.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Each capsule contains: Retinyl Palmitate (Vitamin A) 10000IU
equiv. to Retinol 3mg/3000mcg

Directions

Adults- Take one capsule daily (with food), or as professionally prescribed.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C in a dry place. Do not use if bottle and/or cap seal is missing or broken. Keep out of reach of children.

Storage Temperature: below 30°C

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
